com.mrdimka.hammercore.common.utils

Class ChatUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mrdimka.hammercore.common.utils.ChatUtil

  • public class ChatUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    Lets you send messages to player without spamming

      • sendNoSpam

        public static void sendNoSpam(net.minecraft.entity.player.EntityPlayerMP player,
                              net.minecraft.util.text.ITextComponent... lines)
        Sends a chat message to the client, deleting past messages also sent via this method. Credit to RWTema for the idea
        Parameters:
        player - The player to send the chat message to
        lines - The chat lines to send.
